devc.name: devC
devc.shortInfo: A linux command line utility to build 'python venv' like reusable virtualenv from Dockerfile/Containerfile or directly from a container image. Virtualenv for containers!
devc.detailedInfo: A linux command line utility to build 'python venv' like reusable virtualenv from Dockerfile/Containerfile or directly from a container image. Virtualenv for containers!

run-unni.name: Run Unni
run-unni.shortInfo: Just a 2D game built for the sake of building it, in collab with my game artist roommate Dev G.
run-unni.detailedInfo: Our charming, old-school Keralite (a kind of South Indian) hero, 'Unni' (/ änniÀê/), has gotten into a bit of trouble. Let‚Äôs see how long you can keep him out of it!

cerve.name: cerve
cerve.shortInfo: A multi-worker HTTP server written in C. Nothing too special, just another personal project of mine!
cerve.detailedInfo: A multi-worker HTTP server written in C. Yet another hackable http-file-server written by a C-lang noob for noobies

sittytalky.name: SittyTalky
sittytalky.shortInfo: SittyTalky: a primitive zero-configuration local network GNOME application purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with my office mates over LAN!
sittytalky.detailedInfo: SittyTalky: a primitive zero-configuration local network GNOME application purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with my office mates over LAN!

stmp.name: STMP
stmp.shortInfo: STMP: Sitty Talky Messaging Protocol, a primitive zero-configuration local network protocol purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with my office mates over LAN!
stmp.detailedInfo: STMP: Sitty Talky Messaging Protocol, a primitive zero-configuration local network protocol purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with my office mates over LAN!

serveM.name: serveM
serveM.shortInfo: A simple Python script (package) to share my screen over a local network. (More like a code dump from another project of mine.)
serveM.detailedInfo: A simple Python script (package) to share the GNU/Linux desktop screen over a local network. (It's not primarily meant to be a standalone project, but more like a code dump from another project of mine.)

stk-ksrtc.name: KSRTC (STK Kart)
stk-ksrtc.shortInfo: Nothing special, just a binary dump (üôÉ) of a KSRTC (Kerala State Road Transport Corporation) Kart developed for SuperTuxkart!
stk-ksrtc.detailedInfo: Nothing special, just a binary dump (üôÉ) of a KSRTC (Kerala State Road Transport Corporation) Kart developed for SuperTuxkart, by a Blender Noob.

tty-html.name: [Pre]tty-HTML
tty-html.shortInfo: [Pre]tty-html: (the logo reads as: 'pookie html') A minimalist python script to pretty print html docs to unix terminal.
tty-html.detailedInfo: [Pre]tty-html: (the logo reads as: 'pookie html') A minimalist python script to pretty print html docs to unix terminal.
